message: When user authenticates themselves in Django, how do I check that from tastypie? Once user logs on, the view includes some JS that pulls data from API, which is backed by tasty pie. I have basic authentication/djangoauthorisation set up on my resources, so the browser pops up http auth window. Is there any way to avoid this? To complicate things further, the same API is used by external tools, and they set http auth in request header with every request
